title: When is zoe coming out for oce
body: when is zoe coming out bcz my friend wants to play zoe so yea when is she coming out for oce

replies.body: Zoe is currently in testing on the PBE, I wouldn't expect Zoe to be released anywhere until next week at the earliest. Could always be later if they decide she needs more time for testing on the PBE, but usually champs are on the PBE for a single patch cycle.
